snippet: The controversy of the moment is the most explosive of Ozzie Guillen’s colorful career, but a Marlins coach and former teammate said Guillen understood the magnitude of his offense.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that the controversy surrounding Miami Marlins manager Ozzie Guillen over his remarks on Fidel Castro is the most explosive of his colorful career, but Marlins coach and former teammate Joey Cora says Guillen understands the magnitude of his offense; says this is not the first time Guillen had publicly expressed admiration for Castro, but now that he works in Miami, everything is different.
lead_paragraph: The controversy of the moment is the most explosive of Ozzie Guillen’s colorful career, but a Marlins coach and former teammate said Guillen understood the magnitude of his offense.

headline.seo: Ozzie Guillen, Known for His Fire, Displays Contrition
